message: Note: This is an auto-generated email, please do not reply. Dear Sir/Maam, Greetings! Thank you very much for contacting us at GARMCO e-Tendering System. You case has been assigned to the concerned support team and your issue/concern will be addressed as soon possible. Yours sincerely, GARMCO Customer Service www.garmco.com https://etendering.garmco.com
